summary.Title: Software Project Lead with Broad Embedded Software Experience
summary.JobHeadline: Software Project Lead with Broad Embedded Software Experience

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Software Project Lead with Broad Embedded Software Experience
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Does it motivate you to take crucial decisions on strategic important projects? Are you thriving in the role as lead, driving complex projects across functions? And can you help EPOS ensure that the software solution meets the needs of the organization end to end? Then join EPOS!

 

The opportunity

EPOS delivers high-end audio solutions for Enterprise and Gaming. Right now, they are looking for a Software Project Lead to lead one of their Scrum teams in realizing their ambitious growth plan. As Software Project Lead, you will work in an agile setup, working across functions within R&D and Product Management as well as communicating with key stakeholders from R&D Senior management and the Front-End Innovation team.

 

EPOS offer you the opportunity to work closely with tech leads in hardware and acoustic engineering, PM office in EPOS’ HQ and China as well as other project managers, the software test team, and solution/ domain architects within the software organization. In close cooperation with UX, SW architect and product marketing, your role will be to transform high level product requirements into measurable software requirements and user stories.

 

More precisely, you can picture yourself doing the following:

  • Act as end to end responsible for the software deliverables in the projects
  • Remove impediments for the team in cooperation with the scrum master and technical leads
  • Plan software resources and estimate tasks within your different projects with the team
  • Evaluate and improve EPOS’ capability to execute software projects in an agile context
  • Lead EPOS’ partners in Asia in the context of project execution

 

The ideal candidate holds the following qualifications:

  • Proven experience with Agile development and project management
  • A fast learner who creates overview, plans, delegates, assesses risks and performances
  • A team player with excellent communication skills in written and oral Danish and English
  • Relevant certifications within SCRUM and project management are an advantage

 

Why work at EPOS?

At EPOS you meet all business departments under one roof: From software and hardware development over sound acoustics, mechanical engineering, manufacturing to logistics, product management, sales and marketing and administrative support. At EPOS, they all share the passion and the strong will to deliver premium quality in everything they do. State-of the-art technologies in a modern work environment, an informal work culture, significant influence on your daily work and our steady growth make EPOS a stable employer of choice.

 

About EPOS

EPOS is a global leader in audio solutions for gamers and the corporate world. Based on pioneering audio technology, they strive to unleash human potential by perfecting audio experiences and delivering innovative design and performance with all of EPOS’ audio solutions. At the core of the company is the ambition to take excellent sound experience for enterprises and gamers to the next level – with the clear purpose to help individuals as well as teams across the globe to achieve their full potential through the power of audio.

 

The name EPOS is derived from Latin and ancient Greek and is used to describe epic stories, speech and poetry. The name encapsulates the dedication to create solutions that enable ways of communication through The Power of Audio.

EPOS is part of the Demant Group – a world-leading audio and hearing technology group that offers solutions and services to help people connect and communicate with the world around them. With headquarters in Copenhagen, Denmark, EPOS operates in a global market with offices and partners in more than 30 countries while it simultaneously builds on more than 115 years of experience of working with innovation and sound.

 

Interested?

The recruitment process is handled by mpeople on behalf of EPOS. If you have any questions about the position or EPOS, please get in touch with Birgitte Vilsgaard on bgv@mpeople.dk or +45 28 18 18 91.

We look forward to hearing from you.

#jobsforukraine
